name: Opus (ZoneStudios)
description:
An OpenWorld Sandbox set in a world called Opus you are given a a forever spanning landscape that will allow the user to travel around and build until their heart is content. 

The story of opus is that you are dropped into a white world with nothing but cubes to explore and creativity to expand upon its a blank canvas for you to create a world within.

Features:

  •  Unlimited Generating world
  • Unlimited Building
  •  Large open landscapes to tall mountains
  • Goals System
  •  3D Voxel world fully destructible.

Controls:

  • Movement = W,A,S,D Keys
  • Left_Shift = Dashing
  • Breaking Blocks = Left mouse button     
  • Placing Blocks = Right mouse button
  • Quit Menu + Controls Page = Escape Key

    (To quit click the button then hit enter.)

Supported: 

Windows 7, Windows 10

Requirements:

  • 800-megahertz (MHz) 32-bit (x86) processor or 800-MHz 64-bit  (x64) processor.
  • 512 megabytes (MB) of system memory. 
  • DirectX 9-class graphics card. 
  • 32 MB of graphics memory.
  •  Windows 7 +

This game is in an alpha stage planning to progress more features

 Planned

  •   UI Cleanup and Inventory Improvements
  •   Crafting
  •   Combat
  •   More Blocks
  •   More Destructive Tools
